name: Belens Forest
description:
Wander around an empty forest and find out what's going on with your friend. 

"Belens Forest" is a platformer that I've made using different sprites from this community. It is also one of my first coding experiences.

Controls: 

  • W A S D to move
  • J for Basic Attack
  • K to use Shield
  • I to open Inventory
  • N to use the Firespin
  • M to use the Sunburn
  • H to drink a Health Potion
